text: a lot of people ask me Joe what's the
best alcohol to drink when I'm trying to
get lean and the simple answer is all
alcohol can't be stored in the body so
really it puts the brakes on fat burning
my personal favorite drink now is a gin
and tonic
slightly less calories and a beer or
mojito a load of sugar if you are
serious about getting lean though
alcohol could be the one thing you've
got a knock on the head for a little
while but everything in moderation so
yeah have a treat enjoy yourself but
don't go too mad on the booze if you're
hungover then a big night on the booze
the next day you're putting the craving
all kinds of junk food sugars
carbohydrates my advice is if you can
get up in the morning drink loads of
water and have a high-fat high-protein
breakfast like an omelet or some
scrambled eggs you're gonna feel so much
better and your energy level are going
to be much more constant
you
